CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Enthusiasts relative to Azure Legion?
SRP.A: Golden Enthusiasts is {below} Azure Legion in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fan engagement?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Azure Legion}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fan engagement?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Silverleaf Supporters}.

VE.Q: What is Crimson Faithful's Fan Engagement in 1996?
VE.A: Crimson Faithful's fan engagement in 1996 is {59.62} index.

VE.Q: What is Silverleaf Supporters's Fan Engagement in 1990?
VE.A: Silverleaf Supporters's fan engagement in 1990 is {72.58} index.

VE.Q: What is Silverleaf Supporters's Fan Engagement in 1994?
VE.A: Silverleaf Supporters's fan engagement in 1994 is {61.21} index.

VE.Q: What are the fan engagement of Golden Enthusiasts, Silverleaf Supporters, and Azure Legion in 1991?
VE.A: Golden Enthusiasts's fan engagement is {85.72} index, Silverleaf Supporters's fan engagement is {69.03} index, Azure Legion's fan engagement is {84.89} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Fan Engagement in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum fan engagement is {51.89} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Fan Engagement in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum fan engagement is {88.80} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Fan Engagement level recorded for Azure Legion?
EVJ.A: Azure Legion reached approximately {85.81} index in {1996}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Fan Engagement level recorded for Azure Legion?
EVJ.A: Azure Legion's lowest recorded level is approximately {54.95} index in {1994}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Fan Engagement?
SC.A: The average total fan engagement is {335.62} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Fan Engagement fall between 317.17 and 350.55 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Fan Engagement exceed 352.92 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Fan Engagement go below 314.80 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1995, was the average total Fan Engagement higher or lower than between 1990 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total fan engagement between 1992 and 1995 was {lower} than between 1990 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1992, did the total Fan Engagement experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total fan engagement between 1991 and 1992 was {smaller} than between 1990 and 1991.

NC.Q: Was the total Fan Engagement in 1990 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total fan engagement in 1990 was {higher} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 1995, did the total Fan Engagement experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total fan engagement between 1993 and 1995 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 1996.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Azure Legion} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Silverleaf Supporters, Shadowfen Devotees, Crimson Faithful, Azure Legion, Golden Enthusiasts}.
